infos.value: What is going on here!? You assured us this path was not overrun with monsters!
Minwu... The last time I saw you was on the battlefield, wasn't it?
You're a white mage of Wezette. Don't try to tell me I'm mistaken.
I was, once. But that was...before.
Before I found myself on the run from Wezette.
Why would you agree to guide us to the very place you're running from?
I am acting under the orders of Lady Glaciela.
Just what is going on in Wezette?
Turning back is no longer an option for us.
Should we attempt to return, we would no doubt encounter Muraga's main forces.
I do. We have no choice but to continue on this path.
